name: Market Path
description:
You are a witch's familiar tasked with purchasing vital supplies. Navigate the Market Path and find what she needs.

Market Path is a single player twine game where you play as one of several different types of familiars. Each animal comes with its own level of benefits and challenges. To complete your mission, you must travel the Market Path, a trail of commerce known only to familiars, run by cats, and financed by frogs. Walk the path, meet new creatures, and enjoy your extra pocket change. But make sure to come home with what your witch needs.

She's counting on you.
